metadata.title: CVE-2021-20273 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in privoxy before 3.0.32. A crash can occur via a craftedCGI request if Privoxy is toggled off.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20273` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.33-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.33-1').
